name.label: Relying Party Name
name.help: The Relying Party Name is a human-readable name for your site. If keep empty, the forum title will be used.

id.label: Relying Party ID
id.help: The Relying Party ID is a unique identifier for your site. It shall be the domain of the website without the scheme. For example, if your website is https://example.com, the rp ID will be example.com. If keep empty, the current domain will be used.

timeout.label: Timeout
timeout.help: The timeout of the passkey verification in seconds. Default value is 60 seconds.

passkeys.title: Passkey
passkeys.label: Passkey are a password replacement that validates your identity using touch, facial recognition, a device password, or a PIN.
passkeys.error: An internal error occurred. Please try again later.

alias-modal.title: Passkey registered!
alias-modal.label: And now, let's give your passkey an alias.
